languages.text: {n}Инквизитор спокойно кивает. На его лице нет и тени ненависти или разочарования.{/n} "Значит, прощайте. Несмотря ни на что приятно было с вами познакомиться, {name}. Свита, ликвидировать Вольного Торговца".

{n}The Inquisitor nods calmly. There is not a shred of hatred or disappointment on his face.{/n} "Farewell, then. I am glad to have made your acquaintance, {name}, despite everything." {n}He glances at his retinue.{/n} "Eliminate the Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: {n}Инквизитор спокойно кивает. На его лице нет и тени ненависти или разочарования.{/n} "Значит, прощайте. Несмотря ни на что приятно было с вами познакомиться, {name}. Свита, ликвидировать Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Inquisitor nods calmly. There is not a shadow of hatred or disappointment on his face.{/n} "Farewell, then. It was still nice to meet you, {name} — in spite of all the circumstances. Retinue, eliminate the Rogue Trader."

{n}The Inquisitor nods calmly. There is not a shadow of hatred or disappointment on his face.{/n} "Farewell, then. It was still nice to meet you, {name} — in spite of all the circumstances. Retinue, eliminate the Rogue Trader."

{n}The Inquisitor nods calmly. There is not a shred of hatred or disappointment on his face.{/n} "Farewell, then. It was still nice to meet you, {name}, in spite of all the circumstances. Retinue, eliminate the Rogue Trader."

{n}The Inquisitor nods calmly. There is not a shred of hatred or disappointment on his face.{/n} "Farewell, then. It was still nice to meet you, {name}, in spite of all the circumstances. Retinue, eliminate the Rogue Trader."

{n}The Inquisitor nods calmly. There is not a shred of hatred or disappointment on his face.{/n} "Farewell, then. I am glad to have made your acquaintance, {name}, despite everything." {n}He glances at his retinue.{/n} "Eliminate the Rogue Trader."

{n}The Inquisitor nods calmly. There is not a shred of hatred or disappointment on his face.{/n} "Farewell, then. I am glad to have made your acquaintance, {name}, despite everything." {n}He glances at his retinue.{/n} "Eliminate the Rogue Trader."

languages.text: {n}L'inquisiteur hoche calmement la tête. Son visage n'exprime nulle haine ou déception.{/n} « Dans ce cas, je vous dis adieu. Ce fut un plaisir de vous rencontrer malgré tout, {name}, {n}vous dit-il, puis il se tourne vers son entourage.{/n} Éliminez {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor nods calmly. There is not a shred of hatred or disappointment on his face.{/n} "Farewell, then. I am glad to have made your acquaintance, {name}, despite everything." {n}He glances at his retinue.{/n} "Eliminate the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'inquisiteur hoche calmement la tête. Son visage n'exprime nulle haine ou déception.{/n} « Dans ce cas, je vous dis adieu. Ce fut un plaisir de vous rencontrer malgré tout, {name}, {n}vous dit-il, puis il se tourne vers son entourage.{/n} Éliminez {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: {n}El Inquisidor asiente con calma. No hay ni rastro de odio ni decepción en su expresión.{/n} «Esto es un adiós, entonces. A pesar de todo, me alegro de haberl{mf|e|a} conocido, {name}». {n}Lanza una mirada a su séquito.{/n} «Eliminen a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor nods calmly. There is not a shred of hatred or disappointment on his face.{/n} "Farewell, then. I am glad to have made your acquaintance, {name}, despite everything." {n}He glances at his retinue.{/n} "Eliminate the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Inquisidor asiente con calma. No hay ni rastro de odio ni decepción en su expresión.{/n} «Entonces esto es un adiós. Me alegro de haberl{mf|e|a} conocido, {name}, a pesar de todas estas circunstancias. Séquito, eliminen a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: {n}大审判官平静地点了点头，脸上没有任何仇恨或失望的意味。{/n}“既然如此，永别了。尽管发生了这样的事情，但我还是很高兴认识你，{name}。”{n}他瞥了一眼他的随行人员。{/n}“消灭行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor nods calmly. There is not a shred of hatred or disappointment on his face.{/n} "Farewell, then. I am glad to have made your acquaintance, {name}, despite everything." {n}He glances at his retinue.{/n} "Eliminate the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}审判长平静地点了点头，脸上没有任何仇恨或失望的意味。{/n}“既然如此，永别了。尽管发生了这样的事情，但能见到你，我还是很开心，{name}。好了，我的随从们，消灭这个行商浪人。”

languages.text: {n}Der Inquisitor nickt ruhig. In seiner Miene liegt kein Funken Hass oder Enttäuschung.{/n} "Dann lebt wohl. Ich bin froh, Euch begegnet zu sein, {name}, trotz allem." {n}Er blickt zu seinem Gefolge.{/n} "Eliminiert {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor nods calmly. There is not a shred of hatred or disappointment on his face.{/n} "Farewell, then. I am glad to have made your acquaintance, {name}, despite everything." {n}He glances at his retinue.{/n} "Eliminate the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Inquisitor nickt ruhig. In seiner Miene liegt kein Funken Hass oder Enttäuschung.{/n} "Dann lebt wohl. Es war dennoch schön, Euch zu sehen, {name}, trotz der Umstände. Gefolge, eliminiert {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}."

languages.text: {n}異端審問官は穏やかにうなずいた。その顔には、一片の憎しみも失望も見受けられなかった。{/n}「では、さらばだ。いろいろあったが、出会えてよかったよ、{name}」{n}彼は従者たちに視線を送る。{/n}「自由開拓者を排除せよ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor nods calmly. There is not a shred of hatred or disappointment on his face.{/n} "Farewell, then. I am glad to have made your acquaintance, {name}, despite everything." {n}He glances at his retinue.{/n} "Eliminate the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: {n}異端審問官は穏やかにうなずいた。その顔には、一片の憎しみも失望も見受けられなかった。{/n}「では、さらばだ。いろいろあったが、出会えてよかったよ、{name}」{n}彼は従者たちに視線を送る。{/n}「自由開拓者を排除せよ」

languages.text: {n}Engizisyoncu, sakince başını sallıyor. Yüzünde hayal kırıklığı veya nefretten eser yok.{/n} "Elveda. Her şeye rağmen seninle tanımış olmaktan memnunum {name}." {n}Maiyetine bakıyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir'i ortadan kaldırın."
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor nods calmly. There is not a shred of hatred or disappointment on his face.{/n} "Farewell, then. I am glad to have made your acquaintance, {name}, despite everything." {n}He glances at his retinue.{/n} "Eliminate the Rogue Trader."
